name: Last Train Out
description:
Control two characters to manage the systems on the Last Train Out.

Keep the power running and you might just escape the apocalypse.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:
- Swap Characters: Tab
- Action: Up, W, E
- Move: A, D, Left/Right
- Jump: Space
- Drop Down: S, Down
- Quit Game: Escape

XBOX CONTROLLER:
- Swap Characters: Y
- Action: X
- Move: Left Stick
- Jump: A
- Drop Down: Left Stick Down
- Quit Game: Escape

Tools:

Unity 2017, Photoshop, Audacity, GitHub

Special Thanks to:

Peanut, Iris, Finn, Iuli, Vlad, BenSounds, Filip Radulescu, everyone at IntenseLife (except Tudor ... it's NOT A PLATFORMER FUUUUUU!!!!)

*reuploaded the mac version to fix a looping sound issue.
